meta.disclaimer: I am an AI support tool, not a doctor. This is a screening, not a diagnosis.

crisis.response: I’m really glad you spoke up. I’m not equipped to help with emergencies. Please contact a human immediately. In India, call Kiran at 1800-599-0019 or dial 112. You deserve real support right now.

intro.welcome: Hello. I’m Aura. I’m here to help you check in with your mental well-being. I am not a doctor, and this is not a diagnosis. Would you like to continue?
intro.exitResponse: That’s okay. You can come back anytime.

moodSelection.prompt: How have you been feeling lately? You can say sad, anxious, stressed, low energy, or not sure.

answerMapping.clarifyPrompt: Would you say that was not at all, sometimes, often, or nearly every day?

PHQ9.name: Depression Screening
questions: Over the last two weeks, have you felt little interest or pleasure in doing things?
Have you been feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?
Have you had trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?
Have you been feeling tired or having little energy?
Have you had poor appetite or overeating?
Have you been feeling bad about yourself or that you are a failure?
Have you had trouble concentrating on things like reading or watching TV?
Have you been moving or speaking very slowly, or the opposite — very restless?
Have you had thoughts that you would be better off dead or hurting yourself?

GAD7.name: Anxiety Screening
questions: Over the last two weeks, have you felt nervous or on edge?
Have you been unable to stop or control worrying?
Have you worried too much about different things?
Have you had trouble relaxing?
Have you been so restless that it is hard to sit still?
Have you become easily annoyed or irritable?
Have you felt afraid as if something awful might happen?

GHQ12.name: General Stress Screening
questions: Have you been able to concentrate on what you are doing?
Have you lost much sleep over worry?
Have you felt you are playing a useful role in things?
Have you felt capable of making decisions?
Have you felt constantly under strain?
Have you felt you couldn't overcome difficulties?
Have you been able to enjoy normal activities?
Have you been able to face problems?
Have you been feeling unhappy or depressed?
Have you been losing confidence?
Have you been thinking of yourself as worthless?
Have you been feeling reasonably happy?

minimal.message: Your responses suggest mild distress. This is something many people experience.
suggestions: Try slow breathing for two minutes.

mild.message: You seem to be carrying some stress right now. You do not have to manage it alone.

moderate.message: You appear to be dealing with a significant amount of emotional strain.

severe.message: Your responses show high distress. Professional support is strongly recommended.
suggestions: Seek help from a licensed therapist.
Talk to a trusted family member today.
Contact a mental health helpline if needed.
